Empompo "Deyesse" Loway, bụ onye na-edekọ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-akpọ saxophonist, na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Ọ bụ onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke Franco Luambo duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo n'afọ 1980s.

O nyeere onye na-agụ egwu Congo bụ M'Pongo Love aka na mbido ọrụ ya site n'ịhazi egwu ya ma nweta onye nkwado bara ọgaranya iji kwado ọrụ ya. Ya na M'Pongo kewara n'etiti afọ 1980, o wee lekwasị anya n'ịzụlite onye ọzọ na-eto eto na-agụ egwú Congo, Vonga Ndayimba, nke a maara dịka Vonga Aye na otu ndị na-akwado ya nke a maara dị ka Elo Music Ná mmalite afọ 1981, ya na onye na-egwu egwu Dr Nico Kasanda dekọrọ ọtụtụ egwu na Benin. Mgbe Nico hapụrụ Tabu Ley's Orchestre Afrisa International n'etiti 1981, Empompo gwara Nico ka ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụfọdụ ọrụ ya. Empompo ya na Vonga Aye, Nico na ndị egwu 3 ndị ọzọ sitere na Elo Music nọrọ otu ọnwa na Paris na-edekọ na njedebe nke afọ 1981. Dị ka Empompo si kwuo, ha dekọrọ ihe zuru ezu maka abọm isii, mana ọ bụ naanị abụọ ka ewepụtara, ha abụọ n'okpuru aha Vonga Aye.
N'afọ 1983, na Kinshasa, Empompo na enyi ya si TPOK Jazz, Sam Mangwana, ya na onye na-agụ egwu Ndombe Opertun, onye hapụrụ TPOK Jazz n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, guzobere otu egwu Tiers Monde Coopération
A gbanwere ìgwè ahụ afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị dị ka Tiers Monde Révolution

Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị 21 Jenụwarị 1990. Ken Braun, onye isi Sterns Music's na United States, kọwara Empompo Loway ya na Modero Mekanisi dị ka "ndị kacha mma na-akpọ saxophonists Congo nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ".
